events.message: We have just received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will begin the review process shortly.
The candidate's application was categorised under Engineering based on their experience as a software developer and relevant skills.
A recruiter specializing in technical roles has been assigned to manage this candidate's recruitment process and will reach out soon.
The initial screening was completed successfully, and the candidate demonstrated solid knowledge in software development principles.
The candidate responded promptly and is enthusiastic about moving forward to the technical interview stage.
We have scheduled the technical interview for the candidate next Monday at 2 PM to evaluate their coding and problem-solving skills.
The technical interview was completed successfully; the candidate showed excellent knowledge in system design and coding efficiency.
The HR interview has been scheduled for Wednesday to discuss work culture fit, benefits, and salary expectations.
The HR interview was completed positively, and the candidate expressed strong interest in joining the company.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate, including details on compensation, benefits, and joining date.
The candidate provided feedback, indicating acceptance of the offer and excitement about the opportunity.
The candidate formally accepted the offer and is now ready to proceed with onboarding.
The onboarding process has begun, with the candidate completing required documentation and IT setup.
The hiring process has successfully closed with the candidate fully integrated into the engineering team.
